messages.title: Campaign for New Hospital
messages.content: Peter has been campaigning long before the last election for a new hospital to replace the ageing one we currently have.

messages.title: Campaign for More Police Officers On The Streets
messages.content: On the 11th of May 2019, Peter welcomed Home Secretary Sajid Javid to Wellingborough.

messages.title: Stop Overdevelopment. Limit Immigration.
messages.content: It’s not racist to talk about immigration, or to say that we are overcrowded.

messages.title: Things Can Only Get Better?
messages.content: Wellingborough and Rushden, like the rest of the country, has suffered under Labour.

messages.title: Unemployment Doubles in Wellingborough Under Labour
messages.content: You can vote with a PIN number – you do not need to take your polling card in order to vote!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Peter Bone has been campaigning for a new hospital to replace the ageing one currently existing.
Welcomes efforts and supports the increase of police presence on the streets of Wellingborough.
Advocates for discussing immigration openly and addressing issues of overcrowding and overdevelopment.

issues.immigration: It’s not racist to talk about immigration, or to say that we are overcrowded.

images.caption: Peter Bone listening to, campaigning for
Campaign for more police officers on the streets
Peter Bone with Sajid Javid and local police
Unemployment doubles in Wellingborough under Labour
